title: Band, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique:  bobbin made continuous tape with bars added
dimensions:
H x W: 8.5 x 99 cm (3 3/8 x 39 in.)
Repeat H: 15.9 cm (6 1/4 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border with a pattern of elaborate, intertwining narrow branches accented by blossoms at intervals. Pattern connected by brides picotées.
